text: Hello. How are you doing today?
Hi. I'm doing well on this holiday.
I'm very glad to hear that. Can I ask if you are someone who is interested in charitable organizations?
Most likely. I have given to different local organizations regularly.
That is very good to hear and I thank you for helping others. Have you ever donated to the organization Save the Children?
I've heard of them, maybe from television commercials.
Do you know much about what they do?
Not really. Can you tell me more?
I would be happy to. Save the Children works nationally and internationally to help children. They promote children's rights, provide relief, and support children in developing countries.
So Save the Children does help children in the United States as well as around the world?
That is correct. And people can be sure that their money is being well spent when they donate because 86% of all expenditures go to program services.
Oh, ok. That's good to know since there are way too many charities that don't.

Yes, unfortunately some charities use more than the should to pay high salaries for CEO's. Please also be aware that Save the Children even does work in countries like war torn Syria where 1,000 children were injured or killed in the first 2 months of 2018 alone.
I think I'm interested but how would I donate from here?

You can go to their website directly anytime. You can also donate now if you would like. How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment ($2).
I think I will donate 20 cents today. After I think about it, I may donate more.
I and the organization very much appreciate it. The funds will be put to good use. They do a lot of good work here and in developing countries where needs are extreme.
So do I just wait and see if my donation is automatically taken?
You will be asked shortly how much you would like to donate. And if you would ever like to donate in the future, please visit the website. Thank you again for your contribution.
Alright. Thanks for the information.
